Disclosures.Group: If you answer YES to these questions, please furnish details.

Fields.Name: UnderIndictment
Fields.Label: Are you presently under indictment, on parole or probation?

Fields.Name: ParoleOrProbationExpirationDate
Fields.Label: If yes, indicate date parole or probation is to expire.

Fields.Name: Offenses
Fields.Label: Have you ever been charged with, and/or arrested for, any criminal offense other than a minor motor vehicle violation? Include offenses which have been dismissed, discharged, or not prosecuted.

Fields.Name: Probation
Fields.Label: Have you ever been convicted, placed on pretrial diversion, or placed on any form of probation, including adjudication with held pending probation, for any criminal offense other than a minor vehicle violation?

Fields.Name: BankruptInfo
Fields.Label: Have you or any officer of your company ever been involved in a bankruptcy or insolvency proceedings?

Fields.Name: PendingLawsuits
Fields.Label: Are you and your business involved in any pending lawsuits?

Fields.Name: ApplicantOwnership
Fields.Label: Does the applicant own 25% or more of another company?

Fields.Label: If financed, please outline loan terms
